name: Send Zonka Feedback email surveys from a new row in a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet
description:
Every time you add a new row to a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet, Make will automatically send an email survey in Zonka Feedback.

Your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet has to contain headers. The template uses this [worksheet](https://1drv.ms/x/s!Au92ZQn17jiNswdN-F5MeroLMzKO?e=V7ZwvF).
